DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether psycho-educational intervention help people live HIV handle change treatment adherence .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign one two study group : - Group 1 : participant group engage weekly psycho-educational session HIV therapist four week prior start regimen . The session cover topic become active treatment care , improve cop ability develop skill treatment adherence . They also involve questionnaire reading . - Group 2 ( control group ) : participant group simply receive regular treatment regimen .
DOC.criteria: least 18 year age viral load 500 copies/ml currently HAART able read speak English/French current Substance Abuse actively psychotic suicidal
